# üßë‚Äçüéì Student Management System

A full-stack Java web application built using **Spring Boot**, **Spring MVC**,  **Spring Data JPA**, **Spring Web**,**Jsp**, and **MySQL**.

## üöÄ Features
- Add, Edit, Delete, and View Students
- Course and Timing selection
- Responsive UI using HTML & CSS
- Database integration with JPA/Hibernate

## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack
- **Backend:** Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Hibernate, JPA 
- **Frontend:** Thymeleaf / JSP, HTML, CSS
- **Database:** MySQL
- **Build Tool:** Maven

## üíª How to Run
```bash
mvn spring-boot:run
```
